issue.title: Changing z value of pose of object makes it disappear

content.raw:
I think this is expected behavior. You have set the object to collide with the ground plane, then turned off its gravity. This will cause gazebo to think it's in an elastic collision, and shoot the sphere off into the world above the ground plane. Without gravity, there is no way for the object to return back to the ground plane. I don't believe it's possible to move objects below the ground plane.

What behavior do you expect to see?
content.html:
I think this is expected behavior. You have set the object to collide with the ground plane, then turned off its gravity. This will cause gazebo to think it's in an elastic collision, and shoot the sphere off into the world above the ground plane. Without gravity, there is no way for the object to return back to the ground plane. I don't believe it's possible to move objects below the ground plane.

What behavior do you expect to see?
